hero.name: Rohit Nair
hero.title: A Passionate Web Developer Specialized in Angular & Node.js
hero.description: I have good exprieance in build exceptional digital experiences that are fast, accessible, responsive mostly in finance domain building banking product application to Investment web application from legacy application to latest web technology.

aboutTeaser.title: About Me
aboutTeaser.description: I have 4.5 years of experience building user interfaces for web applications in the Finance and Wealth Management sector. Proficient in Angular, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, and various UI component libraries. Proven ability to collaborate effectively in team environments and deliver high-quality solutions. I also have little work experience in backend technology like in .Net, Node js, Seeking to contribute technical expertise in an environment of growth and excellence to achieve both personal and organizational goals.

projects.title: E-Commerce Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive admin dashboard for an e-commerce platform built with Angular. Features include data visualization, product management, order tracking, and user management.

projects.title: Task Management Application
projects.description: A Kanban-style task management application that helps teams track project progress. Includes features like drag-and-drop task management, user assignments, and deadline tracking.

projects.title: Weather Forecast App
projects.description: A responsive weather application that provides current weather information and 5-day forecasts for any location. Utilizes geolocation and weather APIs for accurate data.

projects.title: Personal Blog Platform
projects.description: A full-stack blog platform built with Angular frontend and Node.js backend. Features include article publishing, commenting system, and user authentication.

projects.title: Fitness Tracking Application
projects.description: A fitness application that allows users to track workouts, set goals, and monitor progress. Includes features like workout timers, progress charts, and personalized recommendations.

projects.title: Real-Time Chat Application
projects.description: A real-time messaging application with features like group chats, direct messaging, and file sharing. Uses WebSockets for instant message delivery.

contact.subHeadingText: Have a project in mind or want to discuss potential opportunities? Feel free to reach out to me through any of the following channels.

aboutMe.name: ROHIT NAIR
aboutMe.title: Frontend Developer
aboutMe.summary: Frontend Developer with 4.5 years of experience building user interfaces for web applications in the Finance and Wealth Management sector. Proficient in Angular, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, and various UI component libraries. Proven ability to collaborate effectively in team environments and deliver high-quality solutions. Seeking to contribute technical expertise in an environment of growth and excellence to achieve both personal and organizational goals.

responsibilities: Developed web applications using Angular v17 with a focus on modern architecture patterns
Implemented NGRX state management to optimize application performance and reusability
Created responsive UIs with custom CSS and Flexbox layouts
Engineered dynamic components for use across multiple application flows

projects.title: PFM (Personal Finance Management)
responsibilities: Migrated PFM product to modern technology stack (Angular, Java Spring boot)
Designed architecture for Single Sign-On (SSO) using NGRX state management
Created custom UI architecture enabling adoption by multiple financial institutions
Implemented ADA compliance for accessibility standards
Developed user interfaces for wealth management applications using Angular, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS
Created interactive financial charts with Highcharts for market data visualization
Integrated third-party APIs for customer verification and real-time market data
Implemented Identity Provider (IdP) configuration for secure FINODS environment access

projects.title: HBNO-Welathermapper (Handelsbanken)
responsibilities: Developed secure investment web application for managing funds and stocks (Angular 14)
Implemented real-time portfolio tracking and financial analytics

projects.title: Suitability Test Web Application (Handelsbanken)
responsibilities: Created web-based suitability assessment for investor knowledge evaluation (Angular 10)
Designed dynamic questionnaire engine with scoring system

projects.title: I1Wealth (Product)
responsibilities: Contributed to development of modular Wealth Management platform (Angular 8)
Integrated multiple financial data sources into unified dashboard
